about_the_game:
GameOver is a character plot driven narrative visual novel/interactive that revolves around you meeting characters and getting into game-overs with them to progress time. Focuses on M/M interactions, romance, friendship, and relationships.

                 -----------------------------------------------------------------

You've just woken up after entering a small little town during your travels, but what's this about the rumors about you and the way you came from being... Blocked by... Something? Are the rumors really about you? Or someone else?

Yet when you go out to find out and end up getting too familiar with the locals, why do you wake up in your room? No one seems to remember anything ever happening, while you on the otherhand... All this seems to be playing out like in your dreams? But... Is it really a dream? Or something else?

Explore the town and get familiar with the locals. But be mindful of your condition, you wouldn't want to wear yourself out or anything of the sort. Someone might take advantage of it. And you can't shake the feeling that something wrong is with this town... But what is it?

ABit About How The Game Works

Your Heath is drained whenever you have to do some form of work, or have to get in an altercation of some kind.

Your Stamina is drained as you walk around the town and physically exhaust yourself.

Your Lust increases as you find yourself in physical contact with others.[br][br]Be wary of your stats as people might or might not notice these things. Changing what they'd like you to do for them, or do with you. And when one reaches too low or high... It might just be A

content_descriptors.notes:
tl;dr: Trigger warnings for the following: sexual harassment/sexual assault/non-consensual sex/dubious consent, consensual non-consent, BDSM, kink exploration, drug/alcohol abuse, male/male NSFW content.
GameOver contains furry (anthropomorphic) males. All sexual content is male/male in nature and includes characters drawn nude, engaged in sexual activities in still-image cut scenes, animated GIF-like images, and frequent references to sexual activities including but not limited to innuendo. Characters have various kink preferences such as: BDSM, watersports, musk, inflation, mpreg, transformation, etc.
Additionally, some characters imbibe alcohol quite heavily. Some scenes will feature the player consuming alcohol and/or becoming drunk.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0

name: GameOver

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: GameOver is a text based rpg focused mainly on m/m content with character driven plot. In it, you explore and run into inhabitants of the world. Some friendly, some foe. Inspired by other text based games and some videos.
